name: Flood
description: Vast areas of your kingdom have been flooded. People await your help, what will you do?

option_1.text: Let them build boats
option_1.description: Unable to cope with the flood, people often had to flee their homes, leaving everything behind.

option_2.text: Send armies for assistance!
option_2.description: The support of soldiers saved people from fleeing, but it cost the lives of many of your warriors.

option_3.text: Let local rulers handle it
option_3.description: Local rulers exceptionally managed this challenge well, but it cost you authority and control over those regions.

name: Famine
description: Famine has arrived, and food supplies are running out. What decisions will you make to survive this difficult period?

option_1.text: Declaration of prayer days in hope for better times
option_1.description: People started praying for better times, but it didn't help. People are dying of hunger, granaries are emptying, and the army is falling apart.

option_2.text: Raise taxes to purchase food from other kingdoms
option_2.description: You raised taxes. While you gained food, people died, and your authority weakened.

option_3.text: Initiate a plunder campaign in search of food
option_3.description: You declared looting and robbery. The army is thrilled, but people die, and those who remain see your strength.

name: Epidemic
description: An epidemic has erupted in your kingdom, and the population is suffering from diseases. What measures will you take to deal with this difficult situation?

option_1.text: Organization of quarantine and assistance to the sick
option_1.description: You declared a quarantine for the infected. Many of them perished, and your treasury suffered.

option_2.text: Closing borders to stop the spread of the disease
option_2.description: Borders were closed. Trade suffered, some perished, but people respect you.

option_3.text: Sending a diplomatic mission for medical aid
option_3.description: You sent a request for help and received a response. The state's economy suffered, and you showed weakness.

name: Court Intrigues
description: Intrigues and conspiracies have arisen among the courtiers, posing a threat to the kingdom's stability. What measures will you take to maintain order and loyalty among your people?

option_1.text: Initiate an investigation into the conspiracy
option_1.description: You started the search for conspirators; it cost you a bit, but you showed that you won't be easily defeated.

option_2.text: Convene a council with courtiers for mediation
option_2.description: The council allowed you to secure your position, but it wasn't free.

option_3.text: Strengthen the police force to increase control
option_3.description: Investing in the police provides you with peace and increased strength, but it burdens the economy.

name: Invaders
description: The kingdom is threatened by invaders approaching the borders. What defensive measures will you take to protect the population?

option_1.text: Reinforce border fortifications and prepare the army
option_1.description: Defensive measures have been taken, strengthening your defense, but the economy and people are burdened.

option_2.text: Diplomatic negotiations with the invaders
option_2.description: People rejoice for peace, but negotiations with the invaders don't benefit your army and economy.

option_3.text: Evacuate the population to safe places
option_3.description: You reduced the threat to the people; it was good for them, but the army is not pleased.

name: Bountiful Harvest
description: The time of harvest has come, and the yields are plentiful. What steps will you take to make the best use of this blessing?

option_1.text: Distribute part of the harvest to those in need
option_1.description: You showed the kindness of your heart, and people love you for it; as it is known, people make the kingdom.

option_2.text: Focus on exporting surpluses
option_2.description: You increased food exports, and although you gained from it, people lost a lot.

option_3.text: Plan a grand celebration in honor of the bountiful harvest
option_3.description: A grand ball and feast, people rejoice and celebrate their ruler.

name: Knight Tournament
description: Organizers propose organizing a grand knight tournament that will attract attention from the entire kingdom. What decisions will you make in connection with this proposal?

option_1.text: Agree to organize the tournament as a form of entertainment
option_1.description: You agreed to the tournament; it will cost, but people will be pleased.

option_2.text: Reject the proposal due to costs and safety concerns
option_2.description: You did not agree to any tournament; you saved a bit, but people would prefer some entertainment.

option_3.text: Limit the tournament on a smaller scale to reduce costs
option_3.description: You agreed to the tournament but not on a full scale; people are happy, and the treasury did not suffer too much.

name: Gold Rush
description: New gold deposits have been discovered in the kingdom, attracting miners and adventurers. What steps will you take to benefit from this situation?

option_1.text: Initiate intensive exploitation of the deposits
option_1.description: Harsh conditions imposed by the absurd have killed many workers, but your power has increased.

option_2.text: Start limited exploitation, caring for the environment and sustainable development
option_2.description: Gentle steps have leveled the region significantly and will become crucial for future generations.

option_3.text: Ban gold mining due to concerns about destabilizing the economy
option_3.description: Why bother with risky operations when the peasants on my lands earn enough for me?

name: Scouting the Wild Beast Territory
description: Scouts report an increasing number of wild beasts in the nearby forests that threaten the kingdom's safety. What actions would you take against this threat?

option_1.text: Organize grand hunts for the beasts
option_1.description: It was a truly splendid event; you and your generals had a great time.

option_2.text: Send scouts to investigate more thoroughly and prepare a precise action plan
option_2.description: Thorough preparations resulted in a quick campaign of your army that destroyed the threat without your own losses.

option_3.text: Order the construction of defensive fortifications along the forest border
option_3.description: Why fight when you can build a great wall and not look beyond it.

name: Thief Among the Court
description: Strange disappearances of valuable items have been noticed in your court. What measures will you take to apprehend the thief?

option_1.text: Initiate an intensive investigation among the servants
option_1.description: The thief was quickly caught; it cost many innocent lives, but delivering punishment to the guilty is what matters.

option_2.text: Strengthen personal defense and restrict access to the treasury
option_2.description: A more expensive and numerous palace guard discourages the thief from further thefts.

option_3.text: Send special agents to infiltrate the court
option_3.description: Costly assassins infiltrated the court, thoroughly examining everyone and providing you with a wealth of interesting information; of course, the thief was captured.

name: Barbarian Invasion Threat
description: You receive information about an impending invasion of barbarians from neighboring lands. What steps will you take in the face of this threat?

option_1.text: Mobilize the army to strengthen the border
option_1.description: Thanks to this show of strength, the invasion was repelled, and your army gained many new members.

option_2.text: Negotiate with the leaders of the barbarians to avoid conflict
option_2.description: These barbarians just wanted some gold and food. Let them have it, and they will leave me alone.

option_3.text: Order the evacuation of the population to safe places
option_3.description: To avoid confrontation with the invaders, you ordered the population to leave everything behind and flee into the country.

name: Courtier's Betrayal
description: One of the influential courtiers accuses another of betrayal. What actions will you take in this delicate matter?

option_1.text: Conduct a thorough investigation
option_1.description: A long investigation led nowhere, but it gave you a pretext to kill both of them and seize their influence.

option_2.text: Dismiss the accusations without additional actions
option_2.description: MY FRIEND is innocent!

option_3.text: Banish the accused
option_3.description: As an act of mercy, you banished this traitor from your kingdom.

name: Discovery of Ancient Ruins
description: During a hunting expedition, ancient ruins were discovered. What actions will you take in connection with this discovery?

option_1.text: Organize an archaeological expedition
option_1.description: This allowed you to connect your kingdom with the ancient Empire, providing you with legitimacy and fame.

option_2.text: Secure the area and keep the secret
option_2.description: No one can find out about this. I will use it as leverage in the fight against the nobility.

option_3.text: Ignore the discovery
option_3.description: Who cares about a few old houses or a crumbling castle.

name: Approaching Storm
description: Dark clouds suddenly appear on the horizon. It seems like a storm is approaching. How will you react?

option_1.text: Prepare the population for the upcoming storm
option_1.description: Quick action led to minimal losses.

option_2.text: Order the army to evacuate everyone!
option_2.description: Your misguided and costly decision resulted in significant losses.

option_3.text: Ignore the threat; it's just a storm
option_3.description: Who cares about some rain? If a few beggars die, so be it.

name: Ominous Prophecy
description: Rumors of an ominous prophecy spreading in the kingdom, predicting misfortunes and disasters. How will you react to this situation?

option_1.text: Organize a ceremony to reassure the people
option_1.description: The priests conveyed to the people that the prophecy has already come true, and you prevented it, making the people see you as a savior.

option_2.text: Initiate an investigation into the prophecy
option_2.description: As you suspected, your enemies wanted to destabilize your state, but you managed to catch them in the act.

option_3.text: Ignore the rumors, focus on everyday matters
option_3.description: Who cares about the ramblings of the commoners about some stories? The only thing that matters is the feast on Tuesday.

name: Noble Conspiracy
description: A conspiracy arises among the nobility with the aim of overthrowing your rule. How will you react to this threat?

option_1.text: Conduct arrests and face the rebels
option_1.description: The unexpected operation broke the ranks of the rebels, and despite significant losses, it prevented a rebellion.

option_2.text: Negotiate with the rebels, promising concessions
option_2.description: You cannot afford to let the country descend into civil war, so you decided to give up some of your power.

option_3.text: Escape from the castle, seek refuge outside the kingdom
option_3.description: Maybe in a few years, they will want their king back.

name: Extraordinary Celestial Phenomenon
description: An incredible astronomical phenomenon attracts people's attention. How will you use this event?

option_1.text: Organize a religious ceremony, declaring it a sign of divine grace
option_1.description: Your high priests quickly conveyed to the people that these phenomena are a sign from God that their ruler is chosen by Him.

option_2.text: Ignore the phenomenon, focusing on everyday matters
option_2.description: Who cares about some arrangement of clouds or stars.

option_3.text: Investigate the phenomenon scientifically, trying to understand its source
option_3.description: Months of research did not explain why this phenomenon occurred, but many fields of science significantly advanced.

name: Mysterious Disappearances
description: Mysterious disappearances of people begin to occur in various parts of the kingdom. How will you react to this problem?

option_1.text: Send an investigator to examine the disappearances
option_1.description: The investigation revealed that a mysterious group of assassins was abducting people to recruit them, and upon discovery, they offered you their services.

option_2.text: Organize a citizen's guard to ensure security
option_2.description: People should deal with other people, so new militia units should handle this problem or at least help calm the people.

option_3.text: Disregard the issue, considering it a coincidence
option_3.description: It's probably a few unfaithful spouses running away from their wives or some other trivialities. I have more important things to do than look for individual people.

name: Emergence of a New Religion
description: A new religion has appeared in the kingdom, attracting many followers. How do you intend to react to this event?

option_1.text: Ban the practice of the new religion
option_1.description: You banned those ridiculous heretical notions before they could harm your subjects.

option_2.text: Tolerate religious diversity
option_2.description: Like every religion in the state, this one should be tolerated and subsidized to the delight of the gentry.

option_3.text: Adopt the new religion as the official one in the kingdom
option_3.description: This new idea is very lucrative. In addition to the crowds of religious refugees, the treasures from looted temples have increased your power over the state.

name: Gift from the Neighbor
description: A neighboring state has sent you a valuable gift as a token of friendship. What decisions will you make in light of this generosity?

option_1.text: Accept the gift with gratitude
option_1.description: The gift allowed for numerous investments that you managed to realize, gaining a lot in return.

option_2.text: Reject the gift, fearing hidden intentions of the neighbor
option_2.description: Your suspicion meant that although you lost nothing, you gained!

option_3.text: Organize a festive banquet for representatives of the neighboring state
option_3.description: Using the gift and your own resources, you hosted a huge banquet to showcase your greatness to your friends.

name: Rapid Growth of Trade
description: Your state experiences a rapid growth in trade with neighboring kingdoms. What decisions will you make in the face of this phenomenon?

option_1.text: Invest in the development of trade to increase profits
option_1.description: Efficient investments resulted in a significant influx of gold and other precious metals into the treasury.

option_2.text: Impose additional fees and taxes on trade
option_2.description: A conservative approach eventually killed trade, but incalculable wealth flowed into the treasury.

option_3.text: Form a trade alliance with the most powerful of the neighbors
option_3.description: Utilizing the exchange of goods and culture, you managed to secure a powerful ally for many years.

name: Sheltered Orphans
description: A group of orphans, who lost their families due to various disasters and wars, has appeared in the kingdom. What actions will you take in this situation?

option_1.text: Build an orphanage and provide them shelter
option_1.description: The decision to build an orphanage in your name gained you a lot of positive reputation and improved the people's mood significantly.

option_2.text: Organize a public collection for the orphans
option_2.description: While the collection was fruitful, it didn't gather enough funds to build a majestic facility. However, people look at you a bit more favorably.

option_3.text: Order your soldiers to adopt and raise them as a new generation of soldiers
option_3.description: After a few years, your army gained many new soldiers.

name: Conquest of New Territories
description: Your scouts have discovered an area rich in natural resources. Will you decide to take the risk and conquer these territories?

option_1.text: Initiate a conquest campaign
option_1.description: A long and bloody campaign subjugated new rich territories to your rule.

option_2.text: Conduct research on the area but refrain from aggressive decisions
option_2.description: As a result of the research, your people discovered an incredibly warrior-like people inhabiting those territories. By studying their customs, you managed to create new elite units composed of them.

option_3.text: Ignore the newly discovered areas
option_3.description: As the chosen by God and people ruler, you should rule the land of your fathers, not some uninhabited wastelands.

name: Mocking Artists
description: Renowned artists have created an artwork depicting the ruler in a caricatured manner. How will you react to this provocation?

option_1.text: Ignore and let the art exist
option_1.description: The mockery of authority significantly reduced both your and your administrators' authority.

option_2.text: Confiscate the artwork and punish the artists
option_2.description: The loud artwork, which disappeared from view, quickly lost its fame, and the image of authority didn't suffer much.

option_3.text: Commission your own artwork depicting a positive image
option_3.description: Your quick reaction and huge spending on the artwork overshadowed the piece by independent artists quickly.

name: The Prophet
description: A mysterious prophet has appeared at court claiming to have foreseen an impending disaster. People are starting to react panically. How will you react?

option_1.text: Ignore the prophecy; it's just superstition
option_1.description: The rabble may believe in such tales, but the government and ruler must objectively view the world.

option_2.text: Ban prophecies and imprison the prophet
option_2.description: The costly operation landed the prophet in jail, and his tales quickly withered away.

option_3.text: Exploit the situation to your advantage and support the prophet
option_3.description: Religion as opium for the people. It clouds the people's vision and allows you to rule them better.

name: Peace Talks with an Enemy State
description: An enemy state has started sending signals about its readiness for peace talks. How will you approach this situation?

option_1.text: Engage in talks to negotiate peace
option_1.description: Extended talks allowed you to find a common consensus, ensuring the end of this terrible war.

option_2.text: Refuse talks and continue the war
option_2.description: Empty words mean nothing; the only thing that matters is the strength of the army.

option_3.text: Simulate interest in peace but simultaneously prepare for an ambush
option_3.description: The enemies were convinced you desired peace. This ambush significantly tilted the victory in the war to your side.
